mcq.statement: Why was the Roshnai Gate called 'Roshnai Darwaza'?

options.b: It was built by a king
options.c: It was illuminated at night to aid travellers

mcq.one_liner: The Roshnai Gate was called 'Roshnai Darwaza' because it was **illuminated at night to aid travellers** when the Ravi River flowed alongside the northern wall of Lahore Fort and Badshahi Mosque.
